attr.name: type
attr.description: Only used if the valuetype is set to "ref". Specifies the MIME type of values found at the URI specified by value.

attr.name: value
attr.description: Specifies the value of the parameter.

attr.name: valuetype
attr.description:
Specifies the type of the value attribute. Possible values are:
 
  data: Default value. The value is passed to the object's implementation as a string.
  ref: The value is a URI to a resource where run-time values are stored.
  object: An ID of another <object> in the same document.

content.description: None, it is an empty element.

omission.description: As it is a void element, the start tag must be present and the end tag must not be present.
